channel.title: Help me make my client connect to server
channel.description:
*If you read this and plan on helping please comment to let me know and tell me you plan on what option you doing* (that way i dont sit here thinking im getting no help and i know who to talk to and all)
Ok ive gotten my server online but my computer is only 1 client can connect to my server on. there has been 1player to log on server and play like ahour so obviously its fix able but i wasnt on to talk to him so idk how he fixed.
option1:-somebody please go to kruntscape.ucoz.com, go forums, go dl client, and when you download edit it and make it were it lets you got onto my server. server ip: kruntscape.no-ip.org server port: 43594 If you do somehow fix you can either post on here how you did it so i know and i can fix then reupload it so people can play. or even better you could upload it to megaupltoad.com for me N post the link on here and/or send it to me in a pm.
option2 - If you can find a client and code it to work for my server then upload it to megaupload so i can download and change name and background picture and all that. i need serverip set to kruntscape.no-ip.org before i get it. and please before you upload it an i dl try an use it and make sure it will let you logg onto my server. The client must show skiillcape, gs's, void, torsos and all that, (server im making is pretty much a united pkz/2speced/ my own editing all mixed together. btw it is delta so i aint getting asked
-thx mendes

item.title: Help me make my client connect to server
item.dc:creator: @krunt krunt
item.description:
@krunt wrote:

i tried adding it in like this:

[code=text]private Position curPosition;
}
try
public String findcachedir() { return String.format("%s/%s/", System.getProperty(“user.home”), “.file_store_32”);}
catch(Exception _ex) { }

    return null;
}[/code]

and this was my compile errer code:

.\sign\signlink.java:248: class, interface, or enum expected public static final synchronized Socket opensocket(int i) ^ .\sign\signlink.java:251: class, interface, or enum expected for(socketreq = i; socketreq != 0;) ^ .\sign\signlink.java:251: class, interface, or enum expected for(socketreq = i; socketreq != 0;) ^ .\sign\signlink.java:255: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ .\sign\signlink.java:260: class, interface, or enum expected else ^ .\sign\signlink.java:262: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ .\sign\signlink.java:264: class, interface, or enum expected public static final synchronized DataInputStream openurl(String s) ^ .\sign\signlink.java:267: class, interface, or enum expected for(urlreq = s; urlreq != null;) ^ .\sign\signlink.java:267: class, interface, or enum expected for(urlreq = s; urlreq != null;) ^ .\sign\signlink.java:271: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ .\sign\signlink.java:276: class, interface, or enum expected else ^ .\sign\signlink.java:278: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ .\sign\signlink.java:280: class, interface, or enum expected public static final synchronized void dnslookup(String s) ^ .\sign\signlink.java:283: class, interface, or enum expected dnsreq = s; ^ .\sign\signlink.java:284: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ .\sign\signlink.java:286: class, interface, or enum expected public static final synchronized void startthread(Runnable runnable, int i) ^ .\sign\signlink.java:289: class, interface, or enum expected threadreq = runnable; ^ .\sign\signlink.java:290: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ .\sign\signlink.java:292: class, interface, or enum expected public static final synchronized boolean wavesave(byte abyte0[], int i) ^ .\sign\signlink.java:296: class, interface, or enum expected if(savereq != null) ^ .\sign\signlink.java:299: class, interface, or enum expected } else ^ .\sign\signlink.java:302: class, interface, or enum expected savelen = i; ^ .\sign\signlink.java:303: class, interface, or enum expected savebuf = abyte0; ^ .\sign\signlink.java:304: class, interface, or enum expected waveplay = true; ^ .\sign\signlink.java:305: class, interface, or enum expected savereq = "sound" + wavepos + ".wav"; ^ .\sign\signlink.java:306: class, interface, or enum expected return true; ^ .\sign\signlink.java:307: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ .\sign\signlink.java:310: class, interface, or enum expected public static final synchronized boolean wavereplay() ^ .\sign\signlink.java:315: class, interface, or enum expected } else ^ .\sign\signlink.java:318: class, interface, or enum expected waveplay = true; ^ .\sign\signlink.java:319: class, interface, or enum expected savereq = "sound" + wavepos + ".wav"; ^ .\sign\signlink.java:320: class, interface, or enum expected return true; ^ .\sign\signlink.java:321: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ .\sign\signlink.java:324: class, interface, or enum expected public static final synchronized void midisave(byte abyte0[], int i) ^ .\sign\signlink.java:328: class, interface, or enum expected if(savereq != null) ^ .\sign\signlink.java:331: class, interface, or enum expected } else ^ .\sign\signlink.java:334: class, interface, or enum expected savelen = i; ^ .\sign\signlink.java:335: class, interface, or enum expected savebuf = abyte0; ^ .\sign\signlink.java:336: class, interface, or enum expected midiplay = true; ^ .\sign\signlink.java:337: class, interface, or enum expected savereq = "jingle" + midipos + ".mid"; ^ .\sign\signlink.java:338: class, interface, or enum expected return; ^ .\sign\signlink.java:339: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ .\sign\signlink.java:342: class, interface, or enum expected public static final void reporterror(String s) ^ .\sign\signlink.java:346: class, interface, or enum expected if(!active) ^ .\sign\signlink.java:348: class, interface, or enum expected System.out.println("Error: " + s); ^ .\sign\signlink.java:349: class, interface, or enum expected try ^ .\sign\signlink.java:352: class, interface, or enum expected s = s.replace('@', '_'); ^ .\sign\signlink.java:353: class, interface, or enum expected s = s.replace('&', '_'); ^ .\sign\signlink.java:354: class, interface, or enum expected s = s.replace('#', '_'); ^ .\sign\signlink.java:355: class, interface, or enum expected DataInputStream datainputstream = openurl("reporterror" + 317 + ".cg i?error=" + errorname + " " + s); ^ .\sign\signlink.java:356: class, interface, or enum expected datainputstream.readLine(); ^ .\sign\signlink.java:357: class, interface, or enum expected datainputstream.close(); ^ .\sign\signlink.java:358: class, interface, or enum expected return; ^ .\sign\signlink.java:397: class, interface, or enum expected private static int wavepos; ^ .\sign\signlink.java:398: class, interface, or enum expected public static String wave = null; ^ .\sign\signlink.java:399: class, interface, or enum expected public static int wavevol; ^ .\sign\signlink.java:400: class, interface, or enum expected public static boolean reporterror = true; ^ .\sign\signlink.java:401: class, interface, or enum expected public static String errorname = ""; ^ .\sign\signlink.java:403: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ Class1.java:55: cannot find symbol symbol : method reporterror(java.lang.String) location: class sign.signlink signlink.reporterror("91499, " + class30 + ", " + l + ", " + byte0 + ", " + runtimeexception.toString()); ^ Class12.java:60: cannot find symbol symbol : method reporterror(java.lang.String) location: class sign.signlink signlink.reporterror("47547, " + class30_sub2 + ", " + l + ", " + by te0 + ", " + runtimeexception.toString()); ^ Class30_Sub2_Sub2.java:176: cannot find symbol symbol : method reporterror(java.lang.String) location: class sign.signlink signlink.reporterror("14395, " + i + ", " + l + ", " + runtimeexcept ion.toString()); ^ client.java:38: cannot find symbol symbol : variable midifade location: class sign.signlink signlink.midifade = 0; ^ client.java:39: cannot find symbol symbol : variable midi location: class sign.signlink signlink.midi = "stop"; item.source: Help me make my client connect to server

item.title: Help me make my client connect to server
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“krunt, post:15, topic:393796”]can you give ex. so i have idea what findcachedir looks like? sorry im still kinda new at this. and i been pretty much experiments and teaching myself coding and id like to say im doing pretty good with sources (tuts been helping alot) but client is still got me kinda stomped at this
this is what i think you talking bout: C:\Users\Michael Robson\Desktop\kruntscape client\kruntscape\cache

Modified:
ok, using your advice i did this in singlink:

{ String s = "C:/Users/Michael Robson/Desktop/kruntscape client/kruntscape/cache/.file_store_32"; String s1 = ""; File file = new File(s1 + s); if(file.exists() || file.mkdir()) return s1 + s + "/"; }
i compiled and got no errors, so i ran it worked on my computer but when i tried on brothers… soon as client started loading it says "error trying again in 5seconds.“then"error trying again in 15seconds” and i am pretty sure the reason is because i put how to find the cache on my computer and not the same on everybodies so i want to know what i should change "String s = “C:/Users/Michael Robson/Desktop/kruntscape client/kruntscape/cache/.file_store_32”;
" too so cache can be found for everbody not jjust me.[/quote]

Yes, replace the entire method with this:

public String findcachedir() {
    return String.format("%s/%s/", System.getProperty("user.home"), ".file_store_32");
}

Read full topic

ok, using your advice i did this in singlink:

" too so cache can be found for everbody not jjust me.

item.title: Help me make my client connect to server
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

krunt:

oh can you please tell me how to fix that? just to inform myself and help me fix this if the client cant find the cache would it still be working for me on my computer?

Go into your client files, then go into the sign folder, and open signlink.java

Post your “findcachedir” method here.

Read full topic

item.title: Help me make my client connect to server
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

krunt:

capital e is only difference in Error and error does that make a difference?

Yes.

Chances are the client can’t find the cache.

item.title: Help me make my client connect to server
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

krunt:

the error dont show im my computer. okay this is what happens on mine it loads i type user and pass and click log in and it logs me in. on my brothers computer (and im guessing every1’s besides mine) when you click log in it doesnt log in, it says “error connecting to server”. im cant do pictures cause his computer is in his room shut down and he is 12 and got school tomorrow i dont wanna wake him

Is it “Error” or “error” ?

Read full topic

item.title: Help me make my client connect to server
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

krunt:

ive tried everything. i alrdy portforwarded. use canyouseeme.com, ive got no-ip, ive made port acceptions in firewall, ive changed clients set ip to my server ip. and mopar and google both say it is online so i dled client on bros computer to test and it wont let me connect. ive had like 4 or 5 people use team viewer to check over my stuff an they all said it was all done correctly so they couldnt find the problem either ):

Post any/all errors when trying to connect.

Read full topic

item.title: Help me make my client connect to server
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“krunt, post:1, topic:393796”]If you read this and plan on helping please comment to let me know and tell me you plan on what option you doing
(that way i dont sit here thinking im getting no help and i know who to talk to and all)

Ok ive gotten my server online but my computer is only 1 client can connect to my server on. there has been 1player to log on server and play like ahour so obviously its fix able but i wasnt on to talk to him so idk how he fixed.

option1:-somebody please go to kruntscape.ucoz.com, go forums, go dl client, and when you download edit it and make it were it lets you got onto my server.
server ip: kruntscape.no-ip.org
server port: 43594
If you do somehow fix you can either post on here how you did it so i know and i can fix then reupload it so people can play.
or even better you could upload it to megaupltoad.com for me N post the link on here and/or send it to me in a pm.

option2 - If you can find a client and code it to work for my server then upload it to megaupload so i can download and change name and background picture and all that. i need serverip set to kruntscape.no-ip.org before i get it. and please before you upload it an i dl try an use it and make sure it will let you logg onto my server.
The client must show skiillcape, gs’s, void, torsos and all that, (server im making is pretty much a united pkz/2speced/ my own editing all mixed together. btw it is delta so i aint getting asked

-thx
mendes[/quote]

  1. No one will spoonfeed you
  2. Make sure you’ve forwarded the correct ports
  3. Post any/all errors that show up when you/they run the client.

Read full topic
